column1: CREATE TABLE t_user ( id BIGINT NOT NULL COMMENT '主键id', name VARCHAR(30) NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '姓名', age INT NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '年龄', email VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '邮箱', PRIMARY KEY (id) );, "DROP TABLE t_user
